about_the_game:
About This Game

The first part of the second episode of the Welcome To... Chichester trilogy, and details your first day on holiday in Chichester, England

The HD version is now more in line with what was originally hoped for when development originally started

The Story

Continuing from where WTC 1/Redux left off, the protagonist is unaware of his/her true location, thinking it's still somewhere in America. When faced with the truth, the protagonist has a hard time adjusting to the situation, requiring drastic help from the protagonist's nemesis and over-eager tourist guide. However, there may be more going on than meets the eye.

Features :

  • Updated to HD Resolution graphics
  • Grendel is now (at last) seen wielding her frying pan
  • 7 Endings over 6 routes, with one true ending
  • Play as a much put-upon male protagonist, or a continually harassed female protagonist, both featuring unique dialogue
  • Updated and extended story
  • Internal and Steam achievements - can you find them all ?
  • Mac version included

Characters

Grendel Jinx
The protagonist's nemesis... a kleptomaniac and rather lazy.
Likes to cause everyone trouble


Cindi Eglantine
Tourist guide hired by Grendel for the protagonist. Very knowledgeable about history... and bricks


Hotel Receptionist
Long suffering hotel receptionist.


Waitress
Suffers at the hands (or rather feet) of Grendel to keep her quiet about where the protagonist is


Gorden
Unconventional and foul-mouthed chef of the protagonist's hotel. Gorden and Jinx have prior history


WARNING : DO NOT USE A FRYING PAN AS A WEAPON. GRENDEL IS A TRAINED PROFESSIONAL... ACCORDING TO HER, ANYWAY...

content_descriptors.notes:
- Comedic violence (with the possibility of protagonist death)
- The appearance of choice for sexual assault 
- The appearance of sexual assault

The first part of the second episode of the Welcome To... Chichester trilogy, and details your first day on holiday in Chichester, England

The HD version is now more in line with what was originally hoped for when development originally started

legal_notice:
Sounds effects are from Freesound and Taira Komori
Background art by Mustikadewia and Sku;Te
Character art by Larvinlucas
Frying Pan animation by Rebecca Dawson
Music by Hardcastle and Josh Woodward. Free download: http://joshwoodward.com/

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or later
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2) or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or better
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

name: Welcome To... Chichester 2 - Part I : The Spy Of Chichester And The Eager Tourist Guide HD Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones

short_description: Having trouble adjusting to the protagonist's new location, Grendel Jinx - the protagonist's nemesis - takes drastic action to bring the situation back under control. In addition to that, an over-eager tourist guide wants the protagonist to explore all the local sights
